title: Instrument schema
description: The Electra One instrument is a description of MIDI implementation of a MIDI device.

categoryId.title: Category identifier
categoryId.description: A unique identifier of the category. A short string that is used by parameters to their category.

valueId.title: Value Id
valueId.description: An identifier of a specific value object in the array of values.

controlType.title: Control Type
controlType.description: A type of functional and visual representation of the control.

padMode.title: Pad Mode
padMode.description: A mode tells adjust behaviour of the pads.

controlName.title: Control Name
controlName.description: A name of the control. The name is usually shown underneath the control. When the control receives touch-event via the physical knob, the name is highlighted. If a name is an empty string or the attribute is omitted, the name is not shown and touch indication is disabled.

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: A value to be set when the preset is loaded. The default value is also recalled when user double-taps the control on the touch screen.

displayMin.title: Display Min Value
displayMin.description: A mimimum value of the control's display value range.

displayMax.title: Display Max Value
displayMax.description: A maximum value of the control's display value range.

midiMin.title: Midi Min Value
midiMin.description: A minimum value of the MIDI message value range.

midiMax.title: Midi Max Value
midiMax.description: A maximum value of the MIDI message value range.

midiParameterNumber.title: Parameter Number
midiParameterNumber.description: A parameter number associated with the MIDI message.

midiMessagetype.title: Midi Msg Type
midiMessagetype.description: A type of the MIDI message. The type is not limited to basic MIDI messages but supports their higher level implementation, such as NRPN, etc.

overlayId.title: Overlay Id
overlayId.description: An unique overlay identifier defined in the array of overlays.

hexNotation.title: Hex notation
hexNotation.description: A byte expressed in the hexadecimal notation.

decNotation.title: Dec notation
decNotation.description: A byte expressed in the decimal notation.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier of the instrument file. Please follow syntax: 'dev identifier-instrument file'

name.title: Name of the instrument
name.description: Provides information about the model of the instrument.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the instrument.

manufacturerId.title: Manufacturer identifier
manufacturerId.description: Unique identifier of the manufacturer. Contact electra.one to request new one if needed.

categories.title: Parameter categories
categories.description: A list of parameter categories that makes it easier to organize the parameters.

items.title: Category
items.description: A category a means to organize the parameters in to the groups.

label.title: Category label
label.description: A text label with the name of the category.

overlays.title: Overlay List
overlays.description: An array of overlays. An overlay is a list of text labels or graphical symbols that describe the parameter values.

items.title: Overlay
items.description: Overlays are lists of text labels linked to particular MIDI values. Typically they are assigned to selection list controls or faders. Overlays are referred to by its identifier. Overlay items can be both text labels or graphical symbols represented with bitmap images.

items.title: Overlay Items
items.description: An list of MIDI value - text label pairs.

value.title: Value
value.description: A MIDI value associated with the text label.

label.title: Label
label.description: A Text label that describes the value. The width of the displayed text depends on the the width of the component.

bitmap.title: Bitmap
bitmap.description: A base64 encoded XBM image with 48x18 size.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: A list of mappings for instrument parameters to predefined controls.

anyOf.title: Pad
anyOf.description: A touch sensitive Pad that represents a switch with On and Off state.

values.title: The values list
values.description: A list of values associated with the Pad control.

items.title: Value
items.description: A Value object specific to the Pad control.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message object specific to the Pad control.

onValue.title: onValue
onValue.description: A MIDI value sent when the button goes on.

offValue.title: offValue
offValue.description: A MIDI value sent when the button goes off.

anyOf.title: Fader
anyOf.description: A Fader that can be used change a continuous value of one MIDI parameter.

values.title: The values list
values.description: A list of values associated with the Fader control.

items.title: Fader Value
items.description: A Value object specific to the Fader control.

message.title: Value
message.description: A message object specific to the Fader control value.

anyOf.title: ADSR Envelope
anyOf.description: An ADSR Envelope that can be used to change continuous values of Attack, Decay, Sustain, and Release MIDI parameters.

values.title: The values list
values.description: A list of values associated with the Adsr control.

items.title: Value
items.description: A Value object specific to the Adsr control.

message.title: The message definition for the Adsr values
message.description: A message object specific to the Adsr control values.

anyOf.title: Control List
anyOf.description: A List that can be used to display lists of labels assigned to discrete values of a MIDI parameter.

values.title: The values list
values.description: A list of values associated with the List control.

items.title: List
items.description: A Value object specific to the List control.

message.title: List Value
message.description: A message object specific to the List control value.

patch.title: Patch
patch.description: A device specific container that describes exchange of Patch and SysEx data.

request.title: request
request.description: An array of SysEx bytes to be sent as a Patch Request call.

responses.title: responses
responses.description: An array of instrument SysEx responses to be parsed.

items.title: response
items.description: A definition of the SysEx response parser.

header.title: header
header.description: A sequence of bytes used to identify a specific SysEx message. Matching starts right after the leading F0 SysEx byte.

rules.title: rules
rules.description: An list of rules to parse out individual parameter values from the response SysEx data

parameterBitPosition.title: parameterBitPosition
parameterBitPosition.description: A bit position within a parameter where the parsed value will be placed. Consider it to be a bitshift and logical or operation.

byte.title: byte
byte.description: The position of the SysEx byte to parse. The position is an index of the byte within the SySex message. Index 0 is the first byte after the last header byte.

byteBitPosition.title: byteBitPosition
byteBitPosition.description: A bit position within a byte where the data parsing will take place.

bitWidth.title: bitWidth
bitWidth.description: A number of bits to be parsed out (starting the byteBitPosition) and placed to the parameter (to the parameterBitPosition).
